body_html:
I'm trying to implementing the main idea of SparseCNN described in https://arxiv.org/pdf/1505.02890.pdf (page5) and encountered some problems. Q and H of each layer are different. In order to get the value of Q and H_out, I have to use sess.run() and it may cut the connection of gradient variables.

I wonder if there are some bottlenecks in implementing SparseCNN using tensorflow API.
body_text:
I'm trying to implementing the main idea of SparseCNN described in https://arxiv.org/pdf/1505.02890.pdf (page5) and encountered some problems. Q and H of each layer are different. In order to get the value of Q and H_out, I have to use sess.run() and it may cut the connection of gradient variables.
I wonder if there are some bottlenecks in implementing SparseCNN using tensorflow API.
body:
I'm trying to implementing the main idea of SparseCNN described in https://arxiv.org/pdf/1505.02890.pdf (page5) and encountered some problems. Q and H of each layer are different. In order to get the value of Q and H_out, I have to use sess.run() and it may cut the connection of gradient variables. 

I wonder if there are some bottlenecks in implementing SparseCNN using tensorflow API.
